import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { PromptModel } from '../sub-components/prompt-model/prompt-model.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-quicky-test', templateUrl: './quicky-test.component.html', styleUrls: ['./quicky-test.component.css'] }) export class QuickyTestComponent { questions: number = 10; prompts: PromptModel[] = [] changeQtdQuestion(event: any) { this.questions = event.target.value; } addProve() { let prompt = new PromptModel(); this.prompts.push(prompt) } }

Quicky Test

Message send and scroll to bottom enabled
